content.text: Happy new year! I'm bringing an amethyst to my friend's baby shower because it promotes love and protection.
Happy new year to you too! I'm a go-getter and always looking for ways to challenge myself. How about you?
I'm a hard worker who loves to fish on the weekends. I'm also a high school teacher.
I'm a house wife who loves my cat Cow. I live with my husband and two children.
I also love to go to comic con and geocache in my spare time.
That sounds like fun! I've never been to comic con. I hear it's a lot of fun.
It is! I love seeing all the different cosplays.
I'm sure it is! I'll have to put it on my list of things to do this year.
You should! It's always a lot of fun.
Thanks for the suggestion! I'm sure I'll enjoy it.
You're welcome! I hope you have a great new year!
